title: IP Checker ‚Äî Find Your IP Address and Location
description: Instantly discover your IP address, geolocation, ISP, browser and more. Fast. No ads.
keywords: IP, IP Checker, IP address, geolocation, ISP, whois, ip lookup
hide_ip_with_vpn: Hide your IP address with a trusted VPN
enhance_security_further: Enhance your security further with premium antivirus
hide_ip_from_trackers: Hide your IP from trackers and hackers
privacy_policy_description: How we collect, use, and protect your data when using our IP checker service.
privacy_summary_text: We collect your IP address and basic browser information to provide our service. We use Google Analytics and work with trusted partners. We never sell your personal data.
ip_address_desc: Your public IP address to provide geolocation services
browser_info_desc: User agent, operating system, and browser type for compatibility
location_data_desc: Approximate geographic location based on your IP address
usage_analytics_desc: How you interact with our website via Google Analytics
cookies_desc: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze website usage:
essential_cookies_desc: Required for basic website functionality and security
analytics_cookies_desc: Google Analytics to understand user behavior and improve our service
preference_cookies_desc: Remember your language and theme preferences
provide_ip_services: Provide IP address lookup and geolocation services
improve_website: Improve website performance and user experience
comply_legal_requirements: Comply with legal requirements and law enforcement requests
show_relevant_offers: Show relevant offers from our trusted partners
google_analytics_desc: For website analytics and user behavior insights
hosting_providers_desc: Render.com and other infrastructure providers for website hosting
affiliate_partners_desc: VPN and hosting services we recommend (NordVPN, Hostinger, etc.)
no_personal_data_sale: We never sell your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.
right_access_desc: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
right_rectification_desc: Request correction of inaccurate personal data
right_erasure_desc: Request deletion of your personal data
right_portability_desc: Request transfer of your data to another service
right_object_desc: Object to processing of your personal data
analytics_opt_out_desc: Disable Google Analytics tracking using browser settings or extensions
cookies_disable_desc: Configure your browser to reject cookies (may affect functionality)
data_security_desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
data_retention_desc: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Analytics data is automatically deleted after 26 months.
international_transfers_desc: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure adequate protection through appropriate safeguards.
children_privacy_desc: Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
policy_changes_desc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page.
privacy_questions_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices:
privacy_policy_languages: This Privacy Policy is available in multiple languages
footer_disclaimer: This service provides IP geolocation for informational purposes. Accuracy may vary. We respect your privacy and work with trusted partners to enhance your online security.
